title: Roasted Figs in Prosciutto
introduction: Roasted figs wrapped in prosciutto is a delightful appetizer that captures the essence of Italian cuisine. The sweet, juicy figs complement the savory, salty prosciutto, creating a harmonious blend of flavors. This dish is simple to prepare yet truly elegant, perfect for serving as a first course or a sophisticated snack. A touch of balsamic vinegar can be added for an extra layer of depth.
ingredients: 8 slices of imported Italian prosciutto, halved crosswise
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Cut the figs in half lengthwise. Wrap a piece of prosciutto completely around each fig half. Place the figs on a baking sheet. Bake 10 minutes or until heated through.
Transfer the figs to a serving plate. Dribble each half with a drop or two of balsamic vinegar, if using. Serve immediately.
